belongs_to_collection.name: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley Collection

original_title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley: The Case of the Fun House Mystery
overview: In this episode, the pint-sized private investigators take a spin on spine-tingling amusement park rides and then team up with some hilarious pirates-of-the-midway to catch the scary monster that lurks inside the freaky Fun House.
title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley: The Case of the Fun House Mystery
